localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Managing multiple social accounts can be stressful and time-consuming. Share the same content to all your accounts at once with just a click of a button. Crosspost App frees you from having to do all that manual work, saving over 50% of your time for other important tasks. https://crossxpost.app/
blogPost.body: Managing multiple social accounts can be stressful and time-consuming. Share the same content to all your accounts at once with just a click of a button. Crosspost App frees you from having to do all that manual work, saving over 50% of your time for other important tasks. https://crossxpost.app/
blogPost.title: Crosspost App - Share your content to several social platforms in one click
blogPost.author: ganesh mani

localize.description: 管理多个社交账户可能既有压力又耗时。只需单击一个按钮，即可将相同的内容一次性共享给您的所有帐户。Crosspost App将您从必须做的所有手工工作中解放出来，为其他重要任务节省了超过50%的时间。https://crossxpost.app/
localize.tagline: 一键将您的内容共享到多个社交平台

localize.description: 管理多個社交賬戶可能既有壓力又耗時。只需單擊一個按鈕，即可將相同的內容一次性共享給您的所有帳戶。Crosspost App將您從必須做的所有手工工作中解放出來，爲其他重要任務節省了超過50%的時間。https://crossxpost.app/
localize.tagline: 一鍵將您的內容共享到多個社交平臺

previous.excerpt: SVGX is a FREE offline desktop SVG icon/asset manager and browser for Mac and Windows. Use it to quickly locate the perfect icon for your design, copy and edit the SVG code, generate repeating background CSS, and more.
previous.title: SVGX - Desktop SVG asset manager for designers and developers

localize.description: SVGX是一款免费的离线桌面SVG图标/资产管理器和Mac和Windows的浏览器。使用它可以快速为您的设计找到完美的图标，复制和编辑SVG代码，生成重复的背景CSS等。
localize.tagline: 设计师和开发人员的桌面SVG资产管理器

localize.description: SVGX是一款免費的離線桌面SVG圖標/資產管理器和Mac和Windows的瀏覽器。使用它可以快速爲您的設計找到完美的圖標，複製和編輯SVG代碼，生成重複的背景CSS等。
localize.tagline: 設計師和開發人員的桌面SVG資產管理器

next.excerpt: Spend too much time in Zoom meetings that could be resolved asynchronously? Cut down on your meetings, and spend more time doing deep work with AsyncMeet.
next.title: Asynchronous Meetings - Make decisions without having meetings

localize.description: 花在Zoom会议上的时间太多，可以异步解决？减少你的会议，用AsyncMeet花更多时间做深度工作。
localize.tagline: 不用开会就能做出决定

localize.description: 花在Zoom會議上的時間太多，可以異步解決？減少你的會議，用AsyncMeet花更多時間做深度工作。
localize.tagline: 不用開會就能做出決定
